Welcome to Behavior Therapy Associates

Behavior Therapy Associates (BTA) provides clinical services, consultation and training using evidence-based approaches within the context of sensitivity and compassion while recognizing the uniqueness of each individual and setting.

What is Behavior Therapy?

HI-STEP Social Skills Summer Program 2019

HI-STEPis a 5-week day program focusing on childrens social skills, problem-solving skills & emotional-behavioral skills through group training, individual attention, sports & recreational activities, creative arts, & academic-related activities.

Ready To Get Started?

Behavior Therapy Associates will help you put together the pieces of the puzzle to address challenges you may be experiencing, better define your goals, increase your motivation, map out a plan, and guide you through achieving your goals.
